alert.note: Alert for Upper Iberia; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 02 at 4:52AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Louisiana, including the following parishes, in south central Louisiana, Lafayette, Lower St. Martin, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Martin and Upper St. Mary. In southwest Louisiana, Upper Vermilion. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - 4 to 10 inches of rain has fallen over the past two days with 1 to 2 more inches possible through daybreak. Continued runoff expected to continue flood threat through mid morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Upper Iberia; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion
